concept.title: Using the -dev option to display formatting properties in the output PDF

conbody.p: The PDF files created using dita2mmpdf can be set to contain tooltips which give formatting information for paragraph tags (green), font tags (red), and table tags (blue). Here is an example showing the article_title paragraph in the flowers.pdf file produced using the default template:

The tooltips are shown if the -dev command line option is supplied to the dita2mmpdf.cmd. (The dita2mmpdf -dev option sets the MiramoPDF command line option '-showProperties Y'). By default tooltips are not shown.
